about_the_game:
A video game for parents and children full of adventure and fun!
This game is specially designed for parents and children to enjoy a shared gaming experience. It contains several mini-games that will captivate the whole family.

Discover the wonders of the Earth; The Museum:

Step into a virtual museum together and explore eight unique worlds of animals from our planet.
Experience Earth from the perspective of an adorable robot who lives on Mars and longs for his home and humans.
Explore these fascinating worlds and meet different animals - a great way to introduce children to the wonders of nature.

Fun and excitement at The Haunted House:

Enter a mysterious haunted house full of ‘magical’ rooms.
Watch as furniture magically appears and gradually reveals the corresponding room.
Experience amazing and funny moments together in the haunted house.

Control the Robot to reach the exit; Robot D2-P2:

Take control of the robot D2-P2 and guide him through different platforms and challenges.
Solve puzzles, recognise numbers and letters and complete basic mathematical tasks.
A child-friendly difficulty level ensures that frustration is avoided and fun is paramount.
Laugh at the funny human and robotic body sounds D2-P2 makes when it makes mistakes.

Fun for the whole family:

From 3 years and up, children and parents can enjoy playing together and observe the child's reactions to the animals and the world of play. Highlighting the sounds, images and actions of the play multiplies the child's experience.
At the age of 4, children can already play the ‘Easy Alphabet’ section of the D2-P2 robot independently, as it is specially designed for them.
From the age of 5, children are able to complete the entire game without help.

A perfect gift for families:

This game offers a fun and educational play experience for the whole family. It is the perfect choice for shared moments full of fun, excitement and learning. With its various mini-games, its design aimed at the active and enthusiastic participation of parents and its child-friendly difficulty level, it offers entertainment for children and parents of all ages.
